Hello,


I=C2=B9m using Heritrix 3.2.0 distribution from maven repo on Red =
Hat Enterprise
Linux Server release 6.4.


I enabled the deduplication as a=
ppeared in
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Duplication+Re=
duction+Proc
essors . The output WARC looks fine with the required headers.=



My problem is in crawl report log and the general Total report in Heritr=
ix
GUI interface.


* Crawl.log shows the word =C2=B3duplicate:digest" with=
 each line, however it is
really duplicated or not.
2014-08-12T02:21:14.592=
Z   200        425
http://annualreport.stanford.edu/css/base2.css RLRE
http=
://annualreport.stanford.edu/archive/ text/css #004 20140812022114544+23
sh=
a1:UADILSBKAWFYXZWF7GWUOTQGPJUY62Y6 - duplicate:digest


* Also, the total =
section in heritrix interface is reporting the number
incorrectly.
* Totals=

> * 247 downloaded + 66 queued =3D 313 total
> * 6.3 MiB crawled (7.0 KiB =
novel, 6.3 MiB dupByHash, 0 B notModified)


In this case, almost the 6.3 M=
iB are all novel.


Is it a bug or I=C2=B9m doing something wrong with the =
configuration.


Regards,
Ahmed AlSum, Ph.D.
Web Archiving Engineer
Digital=
 Library System and Services
Stanford University Library
Work: 650-868-7449=
